question: Will the local interest in the search term 'cats' remain above 50 between 0900 to 1700 hours on [date]?  (N.B. The numbers on “Google Trends” represent search interest relative to the highest point on the chart for a given region and time. A value of 100 reflects the peak popularity for a term. A value of 50 means that the term is half as popular. A score of 0 means there was not enough data for this term.)
